PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the other hand , the absorption in the shorter wavelength is largely contributed by the transition from HOMO to LUMO+1 , which is similar to π-π* transition in polythiophene judging by the shape of the orbitals.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| LUMO+1 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities that refer to material properties in the given paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |
| LUMO |
| LUMO+1 |

The entities "HOMO", "LUMO", and "LUMO+1" refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital, Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital, and the next-lowest unoccupied molecular orbital, respectively. These are all properties of the material's electronic structure and are relevant to its optical and electronic properties.

The entity "π-π* transition" does not refer to a material property and has been removed from the list.
